items.sentence: If we\'d been on that plane, we\'d be dead now.

Mary broke up with the boy she had been dating.
Mary is one of the most beautiful girls I know.
Mary started screaming at the top of her lungs.
Mary turned me down when I asked her on a date.
More than 45 million Americans live in poverty.
Tom has been absent from school for three days.
Tom has just finished writing a letter to Mary.
Tom has known Mary since she was a little girl.
